about_the_game:
This is the prologue version to the official full version of the game. This version is limited to the following:

  • The prologue version only allows you access to 1 level.

  • The prologue version allows you get through ~30% of the first level.

  • The prologue version prevents you from playing newer game modes.

  • The prologue version prevents you from unlocking achievements.

  • The prologue version prevents you from unlocking new characters.

A 4-player local co-op rogue-lite bullet-hell dungeon crawling horde game that'll have you and your friends dive into the heart of the action, facing relentless waves of adversaries in a battle for survival.

Experience our dynamic daily challenge game mode feature, where each day presents a fresh challenge to conquer by mixing up different gameplay modifiers, pool of selectable characters, and enemies spawned. With each reset to the daily leaderboards, every day offers a new opportunity to rise to the top.

With multiple game modes to explore, including the ever-changing daily challenge, Letter Lancers promises thrills and excitement for you and your friends. Are you ready to carve your name into the halls of fame and become a legendary Letter Lancer?

  • Local co-op up to 4 players. Get some buddies together in person or invite your Steam friends to play with via Steam's Steam Remote. Controllers are required to play local multiplayer.

  • Stay in the action! Reviving team members made easy, keeping all players in the game without too much down time between deaths.
    1 of multiple game modes -- The standard way the game was meant to be played. Dungeon crawl through procedurally generated rooms, kill all enemies, level up, and get that sweet, SWEET, loot! Struggling with your run and need a boost? We got you. Get rewarded at the end of each run, even if you fail. Rewards can unlock meta progression upgrades to make your runs easier. You got this buddy. A different game mode featuring it's own 24 hour leaderboards. Top daily scores are posted in the Letter Lancers discord server. A procedurally generated ruleset our servers generate that changes the gameplay experience everyday, adding different gameplay modifiers, allowing for only certain characters to be used, mixes up enemies spawned, and ether increases the player's power scaling fantasy, or gives you a real hard time. How far will you make it? Equal playing field: Meta progression upgrades are disabled in this mode. Disclaimer: An active internet connection is required to play the Daily Challenge mode. (You can still play other modes without an internet connection) Compete in leaderboards specific to level, amount of players, and game mode. Standard mode leaderboards are reset with every major update. Daily leaderboards reset every 24 hours, and top scores are posted and immortalized in the Letter Lancers discord. Disclaimer: An active internet connection is required to post your leaderboard scores. (You can still play without an internet connection)
detailed_description:
This is the prologue version to the official full version of the game. This version is limited to the following:

  • The prologue version only allows you access to 1 level.

  • The prologue version allows you get through ~30% of the first level.

  • The prologue version prevents you from playing newer game modes.

  • The prologue version prevents you from unlocking achievements.

  • The prologue version prevents you from unlocking new characters.

A 4-player local co-op rogue-lite bullet-hell dungeon crawling horde game that'll have you and your friends dive into the heart of the action, facing relentless waves of adversaries in a battle for survival.

Experience our dynamic daily challenge game mode feature, where each day presents a fresh challenge to conquer by mixing up different gameplay modifiers, pool of selectable characters, and enemies spawned. With each reset to the daily leaderboards, every day offers a new opportunity to rise to the top.

With multiple game modes to explore, including the ever-changing daily challenge, Letter Lancers promises thrills and excitement for you and your friends. Are you ready to carve your name into the halls of fame and become a legendary Letter Lancer?

name: Letter Lancers: Prologue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 3.0GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 3.0GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: A 4-player local co-op rogue-lite bullet-hell that will have you and your friends laughing your way through epic battles! Grab your friends, pick your characters, and get ready to ruin someone's day! Level up, select from hundreds of modifiers, get loot, and earn your place on the leaderboards!
supported_languages: English, Italian, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Indonesian
